content: free sock pattern *april 2010 updated with new layout to match the a year in sock collection patterns now also available individually * the simple yet elegant honeycomb ribbing stitch pattern makes for a very useful sock for everyday wear the simplicity of the stitch pattern works great with those wonderful multi-coloured sock yarns the colour and the denseness of the pattern remind me of november knowing what november is like where i live some might notice the pun in the title… ---- also part of **a year in socks - a collection of 12 sock patterns** by birgitte zeuner **12 different sock patterns for only $22 usd ** *the pattern in the collection is a modification of the free pattern * a collection of **twelve different sock patterns** one for each month of the year where i ve let the feeling of each month inspire me the product is a collection of twelve different sock patterns reflecting the seasons and featuring a variety of stitch patterns and designs all using the same foundation the sock all patterns include stitch pattern charts all patterns are written as cuff-down but about half of them may be adjusted to toe-up by the experienced knitter
